text: Nuno Alexandre Nogueira Marques (born 17 March 1981) is a Portuguese football coach and former goalkeeper who serves as goalkeeping coach for Notodden FK in Norway. ==Norway== Arranging to a two-year agreement with Lyn of the Norwegian Premier League in February 2004,Lyn kjøpte portugisisk keeper Aftenposten.noPortugisisk keeper til Lyn vg.no Marques was second-string goalkeeper behind Ali Al-Habsi and was sent to FK Tønsberg for the rest of the 2005 season.Lyn-keeper til FK Tønberg Nrk.no Next, he trialed with Bryne, who were in the Norwegian 1. Divisjon, earning a contract lasting until 2008.Nuno Marques ny keeper B-gjengen.comMarques kommer i dag, blir til 2008 Aftenposten.no Despite being the second-choice goalkeeper at Bryne, the Benfica youth graduate started the first round of the 2007 Norwegian First Division away to Løv-Ham,Nuno Marques i mål mot Løv-Ham Stavanger Aftenblad earning praise from his coach despite losing the game.Bare Marques gledet treneren Aftenposten.no However, the Portuguese goalkeeper picked up a knee injury in May that year, leaving him out for the rest of the season.Sesongen over for Nuno Marques Aftenposten.no By 2008, Marques was at Notodden FK, then of the Norwegian First Division, repudiating rumors of Greek clubs signing him.Marques blir på Notodden Ta.no == References == == External links == * * Lyn statistics * Notodden-keeper blir nedringt av portugisisk presse Dagbladet.no * Da baliza do Benfica a um instituto superior da Noruega * Nuno Marques: «Benfica está bem servido de guarda-redes» Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Living people Category:1981 births Category:People from Tomar Category:Portuguese expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Norway Category:Portuguese expatriate sportspeople in Norway Category:U.F.C.I. title: Nuno Marques (footballer)
